items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Address proof available via a utility bill issued by London City Utilities, valid until 2023-12-31.
Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020-2022 are available and verified.
Bank account and postal details are verified, including SWIFT code and postal address.
Headquarters address matches the legal address and is verified.
Jurisdiction identified as Great Britain (GB) based on the LEI data.
Regulatory compliance details for AML, data protection, and others are not disclosed in the Annual Report.
Verified business scope includes operations across Consumer & Community Banking, Corporate & Investment Banking, Commercial Banking, and Asset & Wealth Management.
PEP screening shows confirmed matches requiring additional documentation for resolution.
Total net revenue of $158.1 billion reported for the year ended December 31, 2023.
Market capitalization of $489,320 million as of December 31, 2023.
